name: The Nightmare Angel
description:
A little game made for the WeeklyGamJam  #122 in pure HTML5/Javascript (no engine)

You have to beat the nightmage angel who wants to turn your dreams into... nightmares!

Only one action available: Shoot. Hold the spacebar to automatically target, and release to shoot

When you are holding the spacebar, you are vulnerable to boss bullets, so you have to time your attacks!

I have made everything in the game by myself, except the audio and sound fx

HOPE YOU ENJOY!

CREDITS:

Music: Boss Fight (https://patrickdearteaga.com/chiptune-8-bit-retro/)

The shoot sound fx:  https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/270343/
